name: min_compress_block_size
description: When granule is written, compress the data in buffer if the size of pending uncompressed data is larger or equal than the specified threshold. If this setting is not set, the corresponding global setting is used.

name: max_compress_block_size
description: Compress the pending uncompressed data in buffer if its size is larger or equal than the specified threshold. Block of data will be compressed even if the current granule is not finished. If this setting is not set, the corresponding global setting is used.

name: index_granularity
description: How many rows correspond to one primary key value.

name: max_digestion_size_per_segment
description: Max number of bytes to digest per segment to build GIN index.

name: min_bytes_for_wide_part
description: Minimal uncompressed size in bytes to create part in wide format instead of compact

name: min_rows_for_wide_part
description: Minimal number of rows to create part in wide format instead of compact

name: ratio_of_defaults_for_sparse_serialization
description: Minimal ratio of number of default values to number of all values in column to store it in sparse serializations. If >= 1, columns will be always written in full serialization.

name: replace_long_file_name_to_hash
description: If the file name for column is too long (more than 'max_file_name_length' bytes) replace it to SipHash128

name: max_file_name_length
description: The maximal length of the file name to keep it as is without hashing

name: min_bytes_for_full_part_storage
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: min_rows_for_full_part_storage
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: compact_parts_max_bytes_to_buffer
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: compact_parts_max_granules_to_buffer
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: compact_parts_merge_max_bytes_to_prefetch_part
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: load_existing_rows_count_for_old_parts
description: Whether to load existing_rows_count for existing parts. If false, existing_rows_count will be equal to rows_count for existing parts.

name: merge_max_block_size
description: How many rows in blocks should be formed for merge operations. By default has the same value as `index_granularity`.

name: merge_max_block_size_bytes
description: How many bytes in blocks should be formed for merge operations. By default has the same value as `index_granularity_bytes`.

name: max_bytes_to_merge_at_max_space_in_pool
description: Maximum in total size of parts to merge, when there are maximum free threads in background pool (or entries in replication queue).

name: max_bytes_to_merge_at_min_space_in_pool
description: Maximum in total size of parts to merge, when there are minimum free threads in background pool (or entries in replication queue).

name: max_replicated_merges_in_queue
description: How many tasks of merging and mutating parts are allowed simultaneously in ReplicatedMergeTree queue.

name: max_replicated_mutations_in_queue
description: How many tasks of mutating parts are allowed simultaneously in ReplicatedMergeTree queue.

name: max_replicated_merges_with_ttl_in_queue
description: How many tasks of merging parts with TTL are allowed simultaneously in ReplicatedMergeTree queue.

name: number_of_free_entries_in_pool_to_lower_max_size_of_merge
description: When there is less than specified number of free entries in pool (or replicated queue), start to lower maximum size of merge to process (or to put in queue). This is to allow small merges to process - not filling the pool with long running merges.

name: number_of_free_entries_in_pool_to_execute_mutation
description: When there is less than specified number of free entries in pool, do not execute part mutations. This is to leave free threads for regular merges and avoid "Too many parts"

name: max_number_of_mutations_for_replica
description: Limit the number of part mutations per replica to the specified amount. Zero means no limit on the number of mutations per replica (the execution can still be constrained by other settings).

name: max_number_of_merges_with_ttl_in_pool
description: When there is more than specified number of merges with TTL entries in pool, do not assign new merge with TTL. This is to leave free threads for regular merges and avoid "Too many parts"

name: old_parts_lifetime
description: How many seconds to keep obsolete parts.

name: temporary_directories_lifetime
description: How many seconds to keep tmp_-directories. You should not lower this value because merges and mutations may not be able to work with low value of this setting.

name: lock_acquire_timeout_for_background_operations
description: For background operations like merges, mutations etc. How many seconds before failing to acquire table locks.

name: min_rows_to_fsync_after_merge
description: Minimal number of rows to do fsync for part after merge (0 - disabled)

name: min_compressed_bytes_to_fsync_after_merge
description: Minimal number of compressed bytes to do fsync for part after merge (0 - disabled)

name: min_compressed_bytes_to_fsync_after_fetch
description: Minimal number of compressed bytes to do fsync for part after fetch (0 - disabled)

name: fsync_after_insert
description: Do fsync for every inserted part. Significantly decreases performance of inserts, not recommended to use with wide parts.

name: fsync_part_directory
description: Do fsync for part directory after all part operations (writes, renames, etc.).

name: non_replicated_deduplication_window
description: How many last blocks of hashes should be kept on disk (0 - disabled).

name: max_parts_to_merge_at_once
description: Max amount of parts which can be merged at once (0 - disabled). Doesn't affect OPTIMIZE FINAL query.

name: merge_selecting_sleep_ms
description: Maximum sleep time for merge selecting, a lower setting will trigger selecting tasks in background_schedule_pool frequently which result in large amount of requests to zookeeper in large-scale clusters

name: max_merge_selecting_sleep_ms
description: Maximum sleep time for merge selecting, a lower setting will trigger selecting tasks in background_schedule_pool frequently which result in large amount of requests to zookeeper in large-scale clusters

name: merge_selecting_sleep_slowdown_factor
description: The sleep time for merge selecting task is multiplied by this factor when there's nothing to merge and divided when a merge was assigned

name: merge_tree_clear_old_temporary_directories_interval_seconds
description: The period of executing the clear old temporary directories operation in background.

name: merge_tree_clear_old_parts_interval_seconds
description: The period of executing the clear old parts operation in background.

name: min_age_to_force_merge_seconds
description: If all parts in a certain range are older than this value, range will be always eligible for merging. Set to 0 to disable.

name: min_age_to_force_merge_on_partition_only
description: Whether min_age_to_force_merge_seconds should be applied only on the entire partition and not on subset.

name: number_of_free_entries_in_pool_to_execute_optimize_entire_partition
description: When there is less than specified number of free entries in pool, do not try to execute optimize entire partition with a merge (this merge is created when set min_age_to_force_merge_seconds > 0 and min_age_to_force_merge_on_partition_only = true). This is to leave free threads for regular merges and avoid "Too many parts"

name: remove_rolled_back_parts_immediately
description: Setting for an incomplete experimental feature.

name: replicated_max_mutations_in_one_entry
description: Max number of mutation commands that can be merged together and executed in one MUTATE_PART entry (0 means unlimited)

name: number_of_mutations_to_delay
description: If table has at least that many unfinished mutations, artificially slow down mutations of table. Disabled if set to 0

name: number_of_mutations_to_throw
description: If table has at least that many unfinished mutations, throw 'Too many mutations' exception. Disabled if set to 0

name: min_delay_to_mutate_ms
description: Min delay of mutating MergeTree table in milliseconds, if there are a lot of unfinished mutations

name: max_delay_to_mutate_ms
description: Max delay of mutating MergeTree table in milliseconds, if there are a lot of unfinished mutations

name: exclude_deleted_rows_for_part_size_in_merge
description: Use an estimated source part size (excluding lightweight deleted rows) when selecting parts to merge

name: parts_to_delay_insert
description: If table contains at least that many active parts in single partition, artificially slow down insert into table. Disabled if set to 0

name: inactive_parts_to_delay_insert
description: If table contains at least that many inactive parts in single partition, artificially slow down insert into table.

name: parts_to_throw_insert
description: If more than this number active parts in single partition, throw 'Too many parts ...' exception.

name: inactive_parts_to_throw_insert
description: If more than this number inactive parts in single partition, throw 'Too many inactive parts ...' exception.

name: max_avg_part_size_for_too_many_parts
description: The 'too many parts' check according to 'parts_to_delay_insert' and 'parts_to_throw_insert' will be active only if the average part size (in the relevant partition) is not larger than the specified threshold. If it is larger than the specified threshold, the INSERTs will be neither delayed or rejected. This allows to have hundreds of terabytes in a single table on a single server if the parts are successfully merged to larger parts. This does not affect the thresholds on inactive parts or total parts.

name: max_delay_to_insert
description: Max delay of inserting data into MergeTree table in seconds, if there are a lot of unmerged parts in single partition.

name: min_delay_to_insert_ms
description: Min delay of inserting data into MergeTree table in milliseconds, if there are a lot of unmerged parts in single partition.

name: max_parts_in_total
description: If more than this number active parts in all partitions in total, throw 'Too many parts ...' exception.

name: async_insert
description: If true, data from INSERT query is stored in queue and later flushed to table in background.

name: add_implicit_sign_column_constraint_for_collapsing_engine
description: If true, add implicit constraint for sign column for CollapsingMergeTree engine.

name: sleep_before_commit_local_part_in_replicated_table_ms
description: For testing. Do not change it.

name: simultaneous_parts_removal_limit
description: Maximum number of parts to remove during one CleanupThread iteration (0 means unlimited).

name: replicated_deduplication_window
description: How many last blocks of hashes should be kept in ZooKeeper (old blocks will be deleted).

name: replicated_deduplication_window_seconds
description: Similar to "replicated_deduplication_window", but determines old blocks by their lifetime. Hash of an inserted block will be deleted (and the block will not be deduplicated after) if it outside of one "window". You can set very big replicated_deduplication_window to avoid duplicating INSERTs during that period of time.

name: replicated_deduplication_window_for_async_inserts
description: How many last hash values of async_insert blocks should be kept in ZooKeeper (old blocks will be deleted).

name: replicated_deduplication_window_seconds_for_async_inserts
description: Similar to "replicated_deduplication_window_for_async_inserts", but determines old blocks by their lifetime. Hash of an inserted block will be deleted (and the block will not be deduplicated after) if it outside of one "window". You can set very big replicated_deduplication_window to avoid duplicating INSERTs during that period of time.

name: async_block_ids_cache_update_wait_ms
description: How long each insert iteration will wait for async_block_ids_cache update

name: use_async_block_ids_cache
description: Use in-memory cache to filter duplicated async inserts based on block ids

name: max_replicated_logs_to_keep
description: How many records may be in log, if there is inactive replica. Inactive replica becomes lost when when this number exceed.

name: min_replicated_logs_to_keep
description: Keep about this number of last records in ZooKeeper log, even if they are obsolete. It doesn't affect work of tables: used only to diagnose ZooKeeper log before cleaning.

name: prefer_fetch_merged_part_time_threshold
description: If time passed after replication log entry creation exceeds this threshold and sum size of parts is greater than "prefer_fetch_merged_part_size_threshold", prefer fetching merged part from replica instead of doing merge locally. To speed up very long merges.

name: prefer_fetch_merged_part_size_threshold
description: If sum size of parts exceeds this threshold and time passed after replication log entry creation is greater than "prefer_fetch_merged_part_time_threshold", prefer fetching merged part from replica instead of doing merge locally. To speed up very long merges.

name: execute_merges_on_single_replica_time_threshold
description: When greater than zero only a single replica starts the merge immediately, others wait up to that amount of time to download the result instead of doing merges locally. If the chosen replica doesn't finish the merge during that amount of time, fallback to standard behavior happens.

name: remote_fs_execute_merges_on_single_replica_time_threshold
description: When greater than zero only a single replica starts the merge immediately if merged part on shared storage and 'allow_remote_fs_zero_copy_replication' is enabled.

name: try_fetch_recompressed_part_timeout
description: Recompression works slow in most cases, so we don't start merge with recompression until this timeout and trying to fetch recompressed part from replica which assigned this merge with recompression.

name: always_fetch_merged_part
description: If true, replica never merge parts and always download merged parts from other replicas.

name: max_suspicious_broken_parts
description: Max broken parts, if more - deny automatic deletion.

name: max_suspicious_broken_parts_bytes
description: Max size of all broken parts, if more - deny automatic deletion.

name: max_files_to_modify_in_alter_columns
description: Not apply ALTER if number of files for modification(deletion, addition) more than this.

name: max_files_to_remove_in_alter_columns
description: Not apply ALTER, if number of files for deletion more than this.

name: replicated_max_ratio_of_wrong_parts
description: If ratio of wrong parts to total number of parts is less than this - allow to start.

name: replicated_can_become_leader
description: If true, Replicated tables replicas on this node will try to acquire leadership.

name: zookeeper_session_expiration_check_period
description: ZooKeeper session expiration check period, in seconds.

name: initialization_retry_period
description: Retry period for table initialization, in seconds.

name: detach_old_local_parts_when_cloning_replica
description: Do not remove old local parts when repairing lost replica.

name: detach_not_byte_identical_parts
description: Do not remove non byte-idential parts for ReplicatedMergeTree, instead detach them (maybe useful for further analysis).

name: max_replicated_fetches_network_bandwidth
description: The maximum speed of data exchange over the network in bytes per second for replicated fetches. Zero means unlimited.

name: max_replicated_sends_network_bandwidth
description: The maximum speed of data exchange over the network in bytes per second for replicated sends. Zero means unlimited.

name: wait_for_unique_parts_send_before_shutdown_ms
description: Before shutdown table will wait for required amount time for unique parts (exist only on current replica) to be fetched by other replicas (0 means disabled).

name: fault_probability_before_part_commit
description: For testing. Do not change it.

name: fault_probability_after_part_commit
description: For testing. Do not change it.

name: shared_merge_tree_disable_merges_and_mutations_assignment
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: shared_merge_tree_partitions_hint_ratio_to_reload_merge_pred_for_mutations
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: shared_merge_tree_parts_load_batch_size
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: min_relative_delay_to_measure
description: Calculate relative replica delay only if absolute delay is not less that this value.

name: cleanup_delay_period
description: Minimum period to clean old queue logs, blocks hashes and parts.

name: max_cleanup_delay_period
description: Maximum period to clean old queue logs, blocks hashes and parts.

name: cleanup_delay_period_random_add
description: Add uniformly distributed value from 0 to x seconds to cleanup_delay_period to avoid thundering herd effect and subsequent DoS of ZooKeeper in case of very large number of tables.

name: cleanup_thread_preferred_points_per_iteration
description: Preferred batch size for background cleanup (points are abstract but 1 point is approximately equivalent to 1 inserted block).

name: cleanup_threads
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: kill_delay_period
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: kill_delay_period_random_add
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: kill_threads
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: min_relative_delay_to_close
description: Minimal delay from other replicas to close, stop serving requests and not return Ok during status check.

name: min_absolute_delay_to_close
description: Minimal absolute delay to close, stop serving requests and not return Ok during status check.

name: enable_vertical_merge_algorithm
description: Enable usage of Vertical merge algorithm.

name: vertical_merge_algorithm_min_rows_to_activate
description: Minimal (approximate) sum of rows in merging parts to activate Vertical merge algorithm.

name: vertical_merge_algorithm_min_bytes_to_activate
description: Minimal (approximate) uncompressed size in bytes in merging parts to activate Vertical merge algorithm.

name: vertical_merge_algorithm_min_columns_to_activate
description: Minimal amount of non-PK columns to activate Vertical merge algorithm.

name: max_postpone_time_for_failed_mutations_ms
description: The maximum postpone time for failed mutations.

name: allow_suspicious_indices
description: Reject primary/secondary indexes and sorting keys with identical expressions

name: compatibility_allow_sampling_expression_not_in_primary_key
description: Allow to create a table with sampling expression not in primary key. This is needed only to temporarily allow to run the server with wrong tables for backward compatibility.

name: use_minimalistic_checksums_in_zookeeper
description: Use small format (dozens bytes) for part checksums in ZooKeeper instead of ordinary ones (dozens KB). Before enabling check that all replicas support new format.

name: use_minimalistic_part_header_in_zookeeper
description: Store part header (checksums and columns) in a compact format and a single part znode instead of separate znodes (<part>/columns and <part>/checksums). This can dramatically reduce snapshot size in ZooKeeper. Before enabling check that all replicas support new format.

name: finished_mutations_to_keep
description: How many records about mutations that are done to keep. If zero, then keep all of them.

name: min_merge_bytes_to_use_direct_io
description: Minimal amount of bytes to enable O_DIRECT in merge (0 - disabled).

name: index_granularity_bytes
description: Approximate amount of bytes in single granule (0 - disabled).

name: min_index_granularity_bytes
description: Minimum amount of bytes in single granule.

name: merge_with_ttl_timeout
description: Minimal time in seconds, when merge with delete TTL can be repeated.

name: merge_with_recompression_ttl_timeout
description: Minimal time in seconds, when merge with recompression TTL can be repeated.

name: ttl_only_drop_parts
description: Only drop altogether the expired parts and not partially prune them.

name: materialize_ttl_recalculate_only
description: Only recalculate ttl info when MATERIALIZE TTL

name: enable_mixed_granularity_parts
description: Enable parts with adaptive and non adaptive granularity

name: concurrent_part_removal_threshold
description: Activate concurrent part removal (see 'max_part_removal_threads') only if the number of inactive data parts is at least this.

name: zero_copy_concurrent_part_removal_max_split_times
description: Max recursion depth for splitting independent Outdated parts ranges into smaller subranges (highly not recommended to change)

name: zero_copy_concurrent_part_removal_max_postpone_ratio
description: Max percentage of top level parts to postpone removal in order to get smaller independent ranges (highly not recommended to change)

name: storage_policy
description: Name of storage disk policy

name: disk
description: Name of storage disk. Can be specified instead of storage policy.

name: allow_nullable_key
description: Allow Nullable types as primary keys.

name: remove_empty_parts
description: Remove empty parts after they were pruned by TTL, mutation, or collapsing merge algorithm.

name: assign_part_uuids
description: Generate UUIDs for parts. Before enabling check that all replicas support new format.

name: max_partitions_to_read
description: Limit the max number of partitions that can be accessed in one query. <= 0 means unlimited. This setting is the default that can be overridden by the query-level setting with the same name.

name: max_concurrent_queries
description: Max number of concurrently executed queries related to the MergeTree table (0 - disabled). Queries will still be limited by other max_concurrent_queries settings.

name: min_marks_to_honor_max_concurrent_queries
description: Minimal number of marks to honor the MergeTree-level's max_concurrent_queries (0 - disabled). Queries will still be limited by other max_concurrent_queries settings.

name: min_bytes_to_rebalance_partition_over_jbod
description: Minimal amount of bytes to enable part rebalance over JBOD array (0 - disabled).

name: check_sample_column_is_correct
description: Check columns or columns by hash for sampling are unsigned integer.

name: allow_vertical_merges_from_compact_to_wide_parts
description: Allows vertical merges from compact to wide parts. This settings must have the same value on all replicas

name: enable_the_endpoint_id_with_zookeeper_name_prefix
description: Enable the endpoint id with zookeeper name prefix for the replicated merge tree table

name: zero_copy_merge_mutation_min_parts_size_sleep_before_lock
description: If zero copy replication is enabled sleep random amount of time before trying to lock depending on parts size for merge or mutation

name: allow_floating_point_partition_key
description: Allow floating point as partition key

name: sleep_before_loading_outdated_parts_ms
description: For testing. Do not change it.

name: always_use_copy_instead_of_hardlinks
description: Always copy data instead of hardlinking during mutations/replaces/detaches and so on.

name: disable_freeze_partition_for_zero_copy_replication
description: Disable FREEZE PARTITION query for zero copy replication.

name: disable_detach_partition_for_zero_copy_replication
description: Disable DETACH PARTITION query for zero copy replication.

name: disable_fetch_partition_for_zero_copy_replication
description: Disable FETCH PARTITION query for zero copy replication.

name: part_moves_between_shards_enable
description: Experimental/Incomplete feature to move parts between shards. Does not take into account sharding expressions.

name: part_moves_between_shards_delay_seconds
description: Time to wait before/after moving parts between shards.

name: allow_remote_fs_zero_copy_replication
description: Don't use this setting in production, because it is not ready.

name: remote_fs_zero_copy_zookeeper_path
description: ZooKeeper path for zero-copy table-independent info.

name: remote_fs_zero_copy_path_compatible_mode
description: Run zero-copy in compatible mode during conversion process.

name: cache_populated_by_fetch
description: Only available in ClickHouse Cloud

name: force_read_through_cache_for_merges
description: Force read-through filesystem cache for merges

name: allow_experimental_block_number_column
description: Enable persisting column _block_number for each row.

name: allow_experimental_replacing_merge_with_cleanup
description: Allow experimental CLEANUP merges for ReplacingMergeTree with is_deleted column.

name: compress_marks
description: Marks support compression, reduce mark file size and speed up network transmission.

name: compress_primary_key
description: Primary key support compression, reduce primary key file size and speed up network transmission.

name: marks_compression_codec
description: Compression encoding used by marks, marks are small enough and cached, so the default compression is ZSTD(3).

name: primary_key_compression_codec
description: Compression encoding used by primary, primary key is small enough and cached, so the default compression is ZSTD(3).

name: marks_compress_block_size
description: Mark compress block size, the actual size of the block to compress.

name: primary_key_compress_block_size
description: Primary compress block size, the actual size of the block to compress.

name: primary_key_lazy_load
description: Load primary key in memory on first use instead of on table initialization. This can save memory in the presence of a large number of tables.

name: primary_key_ratio_of_unique_prefix_values_to_skip_suffix_columns
description: If the value of a column of the primary key in data part changes at least in this ratio of times, skip loading next columns in memory. This allows to save memory usage by not loading useless columns of the primary key.

name: max_projections
description: The maximum number of merge tree projections.

name: min_relative_delay_to_yield_leadership
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: check_delay_period
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_max_parallel_sends
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_max_parallel_sends_for_table
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_max_parallel_fetches
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_max_parallel_fetches_for_table
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: write_final_mark
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: min_bytes_for_compact_part
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: min_rows_for_compact_part
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: in_memory_parts_enable_wal
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: write_ahead_log_max_bytes
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: write_ahead_log_bytes_to_fsync
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: write_ahead_log_interval_ms_to_fsync
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: in_memory_parts_insert_sync
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: max_part_loading_threads
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: max_part_removal_threads
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: use_metadata_cache
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: merge_tree_enable_clear_old_broken_detached
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: merge_tree_clear_old_broken_detached_parts_ttl_timeout_seconds
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_fetches_http_connection_timeout
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_fetches_http_send_timeout
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_fetches_http_receive_timeout
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: replicated_max_parallel_fetches_for_host
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.

name: clean_deleted_rows
description: Obsolete setting, does nothing.
